summary: Tutorial only.  Download the trainer mod from IsharaMeradin
descriptionHtml:
Make campfire stages from bright hot to embers.
Make users put wood on campfire to keep it going.
I did not include the .esp file because it would steal
traffic from IsharaMeradin.

You can use the tutorial on its own, but you are
better off downloading the file from Ishara.

TOOLS:
BSA pack/unpacker. I use BSAOpt
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/247/?"]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimmods/247/?

Creation Kit found at creationkit.com
Computer that has at least dual core.
Must have a mod that you have already created to test with the campfire warehouse.
Must download Camp Fire Stages mod from IsharaMeradin
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26799/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D26799%26preview%3D&pUp=1"]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26799/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D26799%26preview%3D&pUp=1

This is a project for campfires that did not have a tutorial to go with it.
So I am adding the tutorial to the .esp file.
author: Ashenfire-tutorial   Ishara Meradin-campfire mod
